cast.overview: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize that the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats that lurk beyond the sand path.
cast.title: A Quiet Place Part II

details.biography: Robert, often credited as Bob, is an American Canadian actor & producer who has been involved in stage & film since 1995. He primarily works out of Buffalo & Niagara Falls but enjoys working out of state for supporting or lead roles. Bob has an extensive history in the M & E field, from all facets of production, to product marketing management for enterprise SAN environments.
details.name: Robert A. Coldicott
